original_text: Then Herod asked all the leaders of the priests and the teachers of God's Law to meet with him. He asked them, ‘Where will God's Messiah be born?’
korean_text: 왕이 모든 대제사장과 백성의 서기관들을 모아 그리스도가 어디서 나겠느냐 물으니

sentences.original_text: Then Herod asked all the leaders of the priests
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 헤롯은 제사장들의 모든 지도자들에게 물었습니다

sentences.original_text: and the teachers of God's Law
Where will God's Messiah be born?
